parameters.name: product
parameters.description:
The product code.

- Call the GetRequestLog operation to obtain the product code from the response.

- Find the product code in the URL of the OpenAPI Portal. For example, <props="china">the URL of the OpenAPI Portal for Short Message Service is https\://api.aliyun.com/product/Dysmsapi. The product code for Short Message Service is Dysmsapi.</props>
  <props="intl">the URL of the OpenAPI Portal for Short Message Service is https\://api.alibabacloud.com/product/Dysmsapi. The product code for Short Message Service is Dysmsapi.</props>
